summary:
Includes crown, body armor, bracers and boots.
EXTREMELY SKIMPY!
descriptionHtml:
* 4 pieces. Crown, body armor, boots and bracers
* UNP BBP body only. Fits all sizes.
* New mesh. Wont replace anything.
* Craft-able at smith. Up-gradable. Statistically equivalent to ebony armor (except crown, which has circlet properties).
* A free set can be found in Whiteruns smith (Warmaidens) on floor above the counter (screenshot of location in pics at the top of the page).
*Install by merging the zipped Data file, with your Skyrim Data file.
*Is nice and shiny, but not overly so :)


As I requested on my last armor mod, if anyone knows how to get Blender to export the UNP BBP body with its two original skin partitions in-tact, Please let me know. Thanks
As it is, the two clean partitions that show up in Nifscope with the default UNP body, are replaced by 3 chaotic ones, upon export from Blender.

My last skimpy armor mod can be found here...

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34775/
author: cyric79
